title: 3 and Out - Colts' Philip Rivers Problem; NFL Week 17/CFB Playoff Storylines; 3 for the $ ATS Picks; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Colts' Philip Rivers Problem; NFL Week 17/CFB Playoff Storylines; 3 for the $ ATS Picks; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why the Colts need to be honest with themselves and move on from Philip Rivers as soon as possible, and previews the biggest storylines from NFL Week 17 and the the CFB Playoff Semifinal matchups. He also gives his 3 for the $ ATS picks, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
